parameters.name: GmtEnd
parameters.description: Query the end time of the verification.

parameters.name: GmtStart
parameters.description: Query the start time of the verification.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for paginated queries. Maximum value: 100, default value: 10.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Verification status:
- **1**: Verification passed.
- **2**: Verification failed.
